fields.name: radar
fields.description: Radar identifier.

fields.name: datetime
fields.description: Nominal time of the volume to which the scan belongs in UTC.

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height bin (lower bound) in m above sea level.

fields.name: u
fields.description: Speed component west to east in m/s.

fields.name: v
fields.description: Speed component north to south in m/s.

fields.name: w
fields.description: Vertical speed component (unreliable!) in m/s.

fields.name: ff
fields.description: Horizontal speed in m/s.

fields.name: dd
fields.description: Direction in degrees clockwise from north.

fields.name: sd_vvp
fields.description: VVP radial velocity standard deviation in m/s.

fields.name: gap
fields.description: Angular data gap detected in radial velocity data.

fields.name: dbz
fields.description: Animal reflectivity factor in dBZ.

fields.name: eta
fields.description: Animal reflectivity in cm^2/km^3.

fields.name: dens
fields.description: Animal density in animals/km^3.

fields.name: DBZH
fields.description: Total reflectivity factor (bio + meteo scattering) in dBZ.

fields.name: n
fields.description: Number of data points used for the ground speed estimates (quantities u, v, w, ff, dd).

fields.name: n_all
fields.description: Number of data points used for the radial velocity standard deviation estimate (quantity sd_vvp).

fields.name: n_dbz
fields.description: Number of data points used for reflectivity-based estimates (quantities dbz, eta, dens).

fields.name: n_dbz_all
fields.description: Number of data points used for the total reflectivity estimate (quantity DBZH).

fields.name: u_wind
fields.description: Wind speed component west to east in m/s.

fields.name: v_wind
fields.description: Wind speed component north to south in m/s.

fields.name: vcp
fields.description: Reference to volume coverage pattern.

fields.name: processing
fields.description: Reference to used processing settings
